document.title: Technical Rider
document.footer_text: Here you can add something important like disclaimers and such.

rows.mix: Guitar, own vocals, lead vocals, bass
Own vocals, bass drum, snare drum, bass, lead vocal

requirements.title: Staff
requirements.content: There must be technical staff doing technical things.

requirements.title: Schedule
requirements.content: The band takes their time setting up. The band will pack up and leave some time after the show.

requirements.title: Sound system
requirements.content: There should be a sound sound system, otherwise the performance is going to be rather quiet.

requirements.title: Stage
requirements.content: The band prefers to perform a stage of some sort.

requirements.title: FOH
requirements.content: The front of house should be in front of the PA and there should be space for a mixer.

requirements.title: Monitors
requirements.content: The band needs monitors to hear what they are doing.

requirements.title: Backline
requirements.content: The band will bring themselves and probably some instruments too.

content.title: Channel List and Stage Plan
content.description: Highlighted channels can be considered optional.

content.title: Equipment Requirements
content.description: Please notify well in advance if any of the requirements cannot be filled by the venue or event organizers.

rows.item: Tall stand with adjustable arm for drum overheads and hi-hat
Tall stand with adjustable arm for backing vocalists
Tall stand with no arm for lead vocalist
For drums, XLR, lengths from 3 to 7m
Enough power cables to cover the needs marked in the stage plan
